item.title: This Man Eats So Much Butter, Cheese, and Beef That Cholesterol Oozes From His Skin
item.description: High cholesterol is considered 240 mg/dL. The man’s was over 1,000 mg/dL.

item.title: 5 Physics Equations Everyone Should Know
item.description: Our physics expert picks his top-five equations, plus a scheme to supply US power needs with a bucket of baseballs. Thanks, Einstein!
